<div width="80%;">
<h3>Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset characterizes the global coverage of rivers and streams. The GRWL Database is the first global compilation of river planform geometry at a constant-frequency discharge, derived with discharge data from 3693 gauge stations, and 7376 Landsat TM, ETM+ scenes.
</p>

<h3>Subdatsets</h3>
| name                              | description                 |
|---------------------------------- |-----------------------------|
|`waterClass`|High-resolution classification of water bodies|
|`cannal`|Per-pixel percent cover of cannals|
|`lake`|Per-pixel percent cover of lakes|
|`river`|Per-pixel percent cover of rivers|
|`tidal`|Per-pixel percent cover of tidal streams|
</div>
